panels.description: Total aircraft seen by the receiver at the given point in time. Filtered aircraft to only those that have been seen within the last 15 seconds to minimize contributions from stale aircraft.
panels.title: Aircraft Seen

panels.description: Maximum range of the currently observed aircraft at the given time
panels.title: Maximum Range

panels.description:
Demodulator - Time spent demodulating and decoding data from the USB SDR dongle. 

USB -  Time spent reading sample data from the USB SDR dongle. 

Other - Time spent doing network I/O, processing network messages, and periodic tasks.
panels.title: CPU Utilization
